reviews.review_msg: Owen tells you exactly what he wants from you, so don't even go beyond that. Just follow what he asks you and you will get a good mark easily.  Most of the info he tells you in class and lectures are super interesting , so don't skip lectures.

He is great. yes he is very strict on the audience and the value of your work. if 
 If you're the type of person who late , even if 5 minutes, I advise you not to take with him, he is very good and gentle with the students who come on time, handed assignments on a time. I will take another course with him
